profile:
YOUR ATTIC EXPERTS.

We are Attic Insulation Experts, offering a wide range of Attic & Roof services. We create efficient, healthy, and worry-free attics!

Our services include:
- Quick, Clean and Affordable Insulation Upgrades with Eco Friendly blown in Cellulose insulation
- Removal of damaged, old or contaminated insulation
- Attic Disinfection
- Attic Ventilation
- Mould prevention
- Mould Remediation
- Attic & Roof Inspections


WE MAKE YOUR HOME MORE EFFICIENT AND LOWER YOUR ENERGY COSTS!
Proper Attic insulation saves you money and ensures a more comfortable home year-round.

We only use the SAFEST, Chemical-Free, Canadian Approved materials.
All our work is Warranted, Guaranteed and Insured

After many years of service in the GTA and surrounding communities, we are confident that we can cater to your needs. We get the job done and we don’t just meet expectations; we exceed them. We get so many referrals because we’re dependable, knowledgeable and pleasant to work with. Our crews provide unmatched service, delivering top quality workmanship for all your needs. We’re not satisfied with our work until you are.

profile: For over 40 years, we have helped Ontario homeowners and builders build safer, more energy-efficient and sustainable communities. profile:
Save thousands by dealing directly with a manufacturer! Canadian Choice Windows and Doors Inc. is a leading manufacturer of windows in Canada, serving Ontario. Canadian Choice Windows and Doors offers a huge selection of replacement windows including energy efficient windows, vinyl windows, casement windows, awning windows and bow and bay windows.

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors has been serving Toronto, Richmond Hill, North York, Markham, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Kitchener, Cambridge, Niagra Falls and the surrounding areas as well as in Calgary, Edmonton, Winnipeg and Northern Ontario. 

Why is Canadian Choice Windows and Doors your best solution for window replacement?

1. No Pressure Estimate: take your time & make informed decision

2. Save Money: Energy Star windows will reduce your energy bill by 30 %

3. Professional Installation: flawless installation and thorough clean up by courteous installers

4. High Quality: The highest quality windows in the industry, featuring foam injected honey comb structure.
 
5. Easy Financing: Financing solutions to fit anyone’s lifestyle

6. Maximum Comfort: low-E coating to reflect summer sun and retain winter heat with our Cardinal Smart Glass system.

7. Zero Maintenance: our windows are easy to clean from within the home and will never fade or discolor

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors is your smartest solution for window and door replacement.

profile:
FANATTICS (formerly known as Titans RoofWorks) specializing in FAN's & ATTIC's!

Our attic insulation installations are performed from the exterior rooftop. This means our team's are keeping distance, keeping safe, and keeping the dirty equipment from entering your home (attic hoses are just gross!), thus, NOT disturbing your everyday. 
We’ll enter through your rooftop vent holes to perform the entire service, and exit through them just the same. We’ll then cap them off with your new roof peak vent system! The larger, upgraded roof peak ventilator's allow our team's to get the job done without entering your home.

Try FANATTICS and you'll notice even larger monthly saving's on your Energy bill, and a more comfortable living environment, while extending the life of your roofing materials and AC unit! Protect your new insulation purchase from attic condensation and dry rot when upgrading with affordable rooftop FAN solutions.

profile:
Exotherm Spray Foam Systems Inc. provides full service wall systems, specializing in spray polyurethane foam installation, fibreglass/rockwool batt insulation, sound attenuation systems, fibrous attic insulation, DC315 thermal barrier, cementitious fireproofing, Vipeq thermal corkshield, as well as finished drywall and framing. We are certified by CUFCA (Canadian Urethane Foam Contractors Association), UFC (Urethane Foam Consultants), Caliber and IFTI (International Fireproofing Technologies Inc.), as well as an accredited business with the Better Business Bureau, members of BILD (Building Industry and Land Development Association), Canadian Home Builders Association, RenoMark and Baumler Approved. 

Servicing the residential, commercial, institutional and industrial sectors alike, we can handle projects of any magnitude, whether large or small, in an efficient, timely manner, all while utilizing the latest equipment, techniques and materials available on the market. At Exotherm, we pride ourselves on being one of the leaders in the industry, and by eliminating the need to contact multiple trades who are often not working on the same page, we are able to see the job through seamlessly from start to finish. All of our installers are experienced, licensed specialists in their field, and strive to complete the task on budget and on time, with a professional and courteous, customer first attitude, so contact us today for a free, no obligation quote!!!

profile:
A preeminent enterprise in the insulation services segment, Four Seasons Insulation is synonym with reliability, quality and on-time service. We are a team of professionals, committed to provide the most satisfying and long lasting services to our clients, all over Toronto, the Greater Toronto Area, Peterborough and Kawarthas. Satisfaction of our clients is our one and only aim, which we aspire to achieve with our prompt and professional services.

***

At Four Seasons Insulation we earnestly understand your need of living in a healthy and safe environment. An ineffective insulation system will not only waste energy and expenses, but can damage the environment as well. We believe that it is our duty and responsibility towards nature to keep our environment free from any detrimental effects. This is one motivating force which derives our desire to excel the expectations of our clients with our services.

***

With a competent and motivated work force on our side, we are capable of handling insulation projects of any type and size. We incorporate the best quality products and services in our each project, irrespective of how big or small it is. Our invincible services are especially aimed at delivering the most reliable and quality oriented results to our valued clients. We possess a credible record of delivering timely results, without ever compromising on quality. Our extensive industry experience and use of state of the art technology makes us highly capable and efficient in creating a healthy indoor environment for you to dwell in.
SERVICES:

***

SPRAY FOAM INSULATION
ATTIC INSULATION

profile:
EcoStar Insulation is one of GTA’s largest full-service insulation contractors. Canadian-owned and operated since 2008, the company has become the leader in the residential and commercial insulation and energy-saving service provider.

If temperature changes have affected your comfort maybe it's time to think about a worthy investment that will give you a long-term solution. At EcoStar Insulation, our mission is to provide viable insulation solutions and top-notch spray foam insulation that are affordable. We supply and install high-quality spray foam insulation, batt insulation, blown-in, and fireproofing insulation. Insulating your home reduces seasonal energy costs, improves indoor acoustics, and addresses the fire protection requisites of the building structure. EcoStar installers are trained and certified, with years of industry experience. We stand firmly behind the quality that our crew offers and we are 100% committed to delivering a reliable service to all of our customers in a prominent efficient manner.

With a 99% possibility to satisfy your insulation requirements within 30 days of contacting our office, it is obvious that each insulation project, no matter how big or small it is, will be accomplished in the best way by our professional team.
